name: 10% For Good for Community Action Network
description: This holiday season, every time you buy one of our Lucky's Market products, 10% of the profits go to Community Action Network (CAN) of Ann Arbor to provide food for families who need some extra help. Look for the red L throughout the store to get products that are a great value, taste great, have no artifical colors, preservatives, or flavors, and give back to the community at the same time. This program runs from November 9th through December 14th, so mark your calendars and thank you for helping us make Ann Arbor a great place for everyone!

name: Exhibit: Avant Garden-Fashion & Plants Together!
description:
Now playing through January 8! Our conservatory exhibit Avant Garden explores the role of plants as the source of raw materials for textiles and the inspiration for fashion’s designs, colors, and shapes.The stars of the show are seven fantasy outfits crafted from plant materials such as succulents, Spanish moss, ferns, and poinsettias, creating topiary couture that ignites the imagination. (Pictured here.) Permission to try this at home! FREE.

Avant Garden runs through January 8, 2017. Open New Year's Day 1- am-4:30 pm. Closed Christmas Eve, Christmas, and New Year's Eve.

Visit the exhibit web page for more info and activity calendar: http://www.lsa.umich.edu/mbg/happening/avant-garden.asp

name: Arbor Opera Holiday Cabaret
description:
NOTE:
Arbor Opera Theater is continuing its series of holiday cabarets parodying celebrities. Dame Julie Andrews will not be present as a person at the event. Singers from Arbor Opera Theater will be creating a show full of celebrity personalities.


Please join Arbor Opera Theater for a new holiday cabaret "It's a Jolly Holiday with Julie." For just $25 you can join 'Dame Andrews' with many eats and treats to celebrate the holiday and ring in the New Year. In case any of our ever-lovely patrons choose to watch their waistlines during this season of overindulgence, we can accommodate by offering discounted seats for $10. So let's eat, drink, and be merry as we finish off this holiday season with some of our favorite things!

name: 25% Off Body Care
description: This week, all our body care is 25% off! Skin care, hair care, cosmetics, soaps- it's all on sale, just in time for your holiday shopping. And with prices like this, you can pick up a few things to treat yo' self, too <3

name: 8-Bit Above w/ Corset Lore, Baron Knoxburry, Infodrive
description:
CORSET LORE (NY)

Corset Lore ‘s experimental song constructions lie at the intersection of baroque style, exotic folklore, modernism, fantasy, science fiction and underground music of the late 20th century.  She writes 8 bit compositions on a Game Boy DMG-01 and sings!

http://www.tamarayadao.com/corset-lore

BARON KNOXBURRY (TX)

Baron Knoxburry takes the stage with a voice, a ukulele, and an arsenal of personal computing power all wielded with vivacious cosmic turboality. The Atari Paddle controlled Commodore VIC-20 booms and scratches against high fidelity and NES electronic compositions.

http://b-knox.com

INFODRIVE

Infodrive uses the Gameboy and Gameboy Advance systems to make you dance your tail off! This deep gb programmer continues to be one of Michigan's most intense and danceable chiptune acts!

https://soundcloud.com/infodrive


The Synth Warehouse  
Michael Hayball is our DJ of the night! 

https://soundcloud.com/thesynthwarehouse

Ohhinaifu
Rachel is on VIZ come say hi!

http://ohhinaifu.tumblr.com/

Located @ Club Above (Above the Heidleberg) Ann Arbor, MI.

$5 suggested donation for touring acts!

name: Brew Year's Eve
description:
Join us for our annual - no frills - New Year's Eve party as we ring in the new year!
We are doing what we do best - sit back, relax and drink some damn fine beer. 

Our featured beers 6 IPAs will be on tap all night long!
*Sacred Cow
*Big Hair
*Dry-hopped Big Hair
*Ringing Saw
*Buzz Saw
*Mr. Delicious

Food specials are available but not mandatory and of course there is no cover.

description:

name: Aventura New Year's Eve Dinner & Party 2017
description:
Join us at Aventura on Saturday, December 31st to ring in the new year in style!

NYE Party | 10pm – 2am | $30
• Live DJ & Dancing w/ DJ LUKE FRUTIG
• Moët & Chandon Champagne Toast at Midnight
• Passed hors d'oeuvres
• Moët & Chandon Champagne & Dessert Station
• Balloon drop at midnight
• Selfie Station with NYE swag. 
• Moët & Chandon Raffle

ENJOY NOCHEVIEJA (New years eve) SPANISH STYLE

12 grapes at 12.00am ( each per bell ring ) with a glass of Cava
